name: Outpost: The Final Battle
overview: Outpost - The Final Battle" is a Shareware game released, initially in 1991 which is, similar to Pirates or Defender of the Crown, a simple strategy game with arcade elements. A cinematic strategy game with arcade sub games. The action took place on a map, were you had to protect your base in the middle. To your defense you had a couple of spaceships, and a gun tower. The gameplay included light saber fencing, dogfights, navigating through asteroid-fields, a pirate shop and infiltrating enemy bases.
